g1.title: Edge Computing Platform & IoT Integration
g1.description: Implement edge computing platform with IoT device management, real-time processing, and distributed edge intelligence
features_planned: Edge computing integration for IoT devices
Real-time data processing at the edge
Distributed edge intelligence with local ML models
Edge analytics with local decision making

g3.title: Embedded Systems & Microcontroller Support
g3.description: Implement embedded systems support with microcontroller integration, real-time constraints, and resource optimization

g4.title: AR/VR & Immersive Experience Platform

Immersive analytics and user experience tracking
